title: Pervade Montego Bay
description: In every patch of sun, shadows lurk, and behind every stretch of paradise, secrets stain the landscape. Montego Bay beckons with everything the heart craves and the soul fears.Once again, I find myself ensnared in the embrace of unforgettable passion and an irresistible power that pulls me deeper into the love shared with two men and the perilous world they inhabit. James Ballad and Xavier Rothschild, with their magnetic allure, continue to weave their influence over me.Yet, on the island of his birth, James conceals a personal secret, guarding it as if his life depends on it. Determined to uncover the truth, I become consumed by the quest, unaware of the unexpected revelation awaiting me.Savor the rum, relish the ecstasy, and I'll meet you in paradise."Pervade Montego Bay" is the second installment in the romance duet crafted by USA Today Bestselling Author Vanessa Fewings, following the acclaimed "Pervade London."
author: Vanessa Fewings
